_meanings:
Applicable to the whole of a radical term,
or to the complete form of the 
verbal base after the conjugational
characteristics have been affixed,
{%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} to the four conjugational or
special tenses.

<ab>N.</ab> of the verbal
terminations of the four 
conjugational tenses (strictly, the personal
terminations of all tenses and moods
except the Perfect and 
Benedictive and the affixes distinguished
by a mute {#S#}).
